## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have added/updated tests for my changes
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`npm test`)
- [ ] I have run the linter (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new public APIs
- [ ] I have updated TypeScript types if applicable

### Security

- [ ] I have not committed any secrets, API keys, or credentials
- [ ] I have reviewed my changes for security vulnerabilities
